item.description:
I do suggest we meet up at Caprice Lounge ar 275 Tremont St, around 8pm, 8:30.

At 10pm I will have my set starting downstairs at Underbar, so who decide to party just send me the names and will be on my VIP List.

 

Thanks 

Rafa

 

 

 

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

by Derek

Just wanted to throw this out there! I have been involved in the industry since I was a teenager. I would love to see some activity in this group. There is a ton of stuff we could organize. Anything from group discussions on were the music is going in the industry to even just meeting up at a club for a few drinks. I also have the set up from vinyl to digital if we found a spot even throw some tunes down Iâ€™m game. 

I have been professionally djing since Freestyle came out and the transformation of house music. I havenâ€™t missed a WMC in the last 10 years. Like I said just throwing it out there to get some activity to share the love of house...

Derek
item.name: Activity
